Name: Regimental Combat Team
Details: Initially developed by the Star League Defense Forces, the RCT consists of a number of different combat elements such as BattleMechs, vehicles, infantry or aerospace assets permanentely assigned to a single organization to train and fight together. In 2876, House Davion adopted the Regimental Combat Team as the standard formation for the Armed Forces of the Federated Suns, by combining a BattleMech regiment with armor and infantry regiments, an artillery battalion and a couple of aerospace fighter wings.
